July 22, 1871 D Stalybridge Contest
Stalybridge Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
stalybridge-contest
None
Stalybridge, Cheshire See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc4287.htm
Band Contest - Stalybridge At a grand brass band contest, at Staleybridge, the first and second prizes wore equally divided between the Buttershaw and Bury Borough bands. Mr. Peers, of Bury, won the cornet prize.
Sept. 5, 2011, 4:14 p.m. May 21, 2012, 8:51 p.m.
1 Bury Borough Unknown
1 Buttershaw Mills (Bradford) Unknown
